text: No matter how you feel today, get up, dress up and show up.
author: Paulo Coelho

text: We choose to go to the moon, not because it is easy, but because it is hard.
author: JFK

text: Abstract scenes are meant to evoke feeling, not explain themselves.
author: David Lynch

text: Between stimulus and response there is a space.
author: Viktor Frankl

text: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

text: You are a story that you tell yourself.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: Let everything happen to you, beauty and terror, just keep going.
author: Rilke

text: It's never too late to start over, never too late to be happy.
author: Sam Harris

text: Act like the person you want to become.
author: Anonymous

text: Knowing how little you matter is very important for your mental health and your happiness.
author: Naval Ravikant

text: Man is not troubled by the events, but the meaning he gives them.
author: Epictetus

text: You become what you give your attention to.
author: Epictetus

text: If you don't have a consistent goal in life, you can't live it in a consistent way.
author: Marcus Aurelius

text: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca
